title: 1.11- The Crowning Mercy
itunes:title: 1.11- The Crowning Mercy
description: Charles II raised an army of Scots to help him claim the throne, but they were defeated by Oliver Cromwell at Dunbar and Worcester.
content:encoded: Charles II raised an army of Scots to help him claim the throne, but they were defeated by Oliver Cromwell at Dunbar and Worcester.
